article_title: IRS Fines Employers For Reimbursing Workers

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: Obamacare is full of taxes and penalties, and many of them make no sense. In particular, penalizing small employers for helping their employees is positively Kafkaesque.
og.title: Obamacare Travesty: IRS Fines Employers For Reimbursing Workers
